Name: Seven Days
About the game: Seven Days is a single-player first-person exploration game. Play as a camper who comes to Camp Summershade for the holidays. A place which is known for it's lush environment and beautiful sunrises. But when you start finding strange things around you, it's up to you to investigate them and solve the mystery... or just enjoy your holiday! Camp Summershade is home to the most beautiful autumn forests, lush plains, ancient buildsites, and the darkest forests. Relax by the ponds, visit the waterfalls or go for a hike at Bridge Islands. There is always an activity for you at Camp Summershade. According to rumors, there are mysterious collectibles hidden somewhere in Camp Summershade. Who hid these collectibles? And why? It's upto you to find out. Explore and enjoy your time at Camp Summershade. It's your holidays after all. And unless you don't want to, there is always a mystery to solve...
